settings.subtitle: Why shop with us?
settings.title: You have evolved. The department store hasn't.
settings.text: This isn't about you having to go through all the styles of every designer each season to find the pieces that will work for you. Your Style Concierge does that for you so you get the best looks with the best fit. And if it doesn't work, you get industry-leading easiest returns, free.

settings.title: ADD-oN SErVICES
settings.text:
We aim to provide the ultimate style experience which is why we extend our services from our website to your closet.

To book a service, please consult your Style Concierge. Not all Style Concierges offer all or any services as is it up to their discretion. You can view general rates on their profiles but recommend confirming prior to hiring for an add-on service.

settings.subtitle: CLOSET
settings.title: OrGANIZATION
settings.text:
Declutter your closet to make your closet functional, yet contemporary, for your everyday needs. 

This service includes: emptying then sorting for keep, donate, disposal and consign; identifying repairs, alterations and dry cleaning; organizing wardrobe by season, style and color; maximizing closet space; creating an inventory of replacement items.

settings.subtitle: CONSIGNMENT
settings.title: LIASON
settings.text: We make it easy to turn your closet into cash with our consignment valet service. Our Style Concierges manage this time-consuming and strenuous task by handling the hauling, the negotiations and the transaction.

settings.subtitle: ALTERATIONS/REPAIRS
settings.title: VALET
settings.text: Put your wardrobe maintenance on autopilot with our repairs, alterations and dry cleaning valet service. Simply label your items needs and preferred service location, and your Style Concierge will pick it up from you and drop it off directly with the business. They will also deliver it back to you when it is ready. Some of our Style Concierges will even pin/mark your alterations.

settings.subtitle: DIGITAL LOOKBOOK
settings.title: DESIGNEr
settings.text: Allow your Style Concierge to go through your existing wardrobe and document complete looks you can pull up for quick and stress-free getting ready.

settings.popup_title: Sign up to Stay in the Know
settings.popup_text: Entice customers to sign up for your mailing list with discounts or exclusive offers. Include an image for extra impact.

settings.title: Lounge In Luxe

settings.subheading: Shop our limited time emerging designer and new collection presales
settings.title: TrUNK SHoW
Perks & Points. Be Our Style VIP.
settings.text: Receive seasonal 25% off coupons, exclusive access to sales, insider updates, “just because” gifts, and more. This is how we luxe.

settings.title: Do I need an account to place an order?
settings.text: Yes. In order to work with a Style Concierge and place orders, you will need to create an account.

settings.title: Can I purchase items without the assistance of my Style Concierge?
settings.text: Absolutely! Add the items you love in your Dressing Room and proceed to Checkout as usual.

settings.title: Can I amend or cancel an item from my order?
settings.text: Depending on the status of your order, it may be possible to cancel an item or change it to a different size. Please note, we’re unable to combine or add an item to an existing order. If you need to make any amendments to your purchase, please contact us or your Style Concierge as soon as possible and we’ll see what we can do.

settings.title: What is a pre-order?
settings.text: Pre-order allows early access to the next season’s most-coveted collections and securing the must-have items everyone is talking about before they sell out. Once your order is placed, we will deliver it to you as soon as it’s available.

settings.title: Where do you ship?
settings.text: Currently, we are just shipping to customers in the United States. We hope to expand in 2021.

settings.title: How long will my order take?
settings.text: Most orders ship out withon one business day and we cover the cost of expedited shipping. However some items have to travel internationally, so they might take a bit longer. Yet other items are made to order, so those will likely take as long as the craftsperson making them needs to guarantee the quality you expect. We strive to give you realistic delivery dates and keep you updated through tracking numbers sent through our system to you.

settings.title: How do I ship my order back to you?
settings.text: Use this text to answer questions in as much detail as possible for your customers.

settings.title: What payment methods are accepted?
settings.text: We accept Credit & Debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover) as well as PayPal & Apple Pay.

settings.title: AT YOUR SERVICE
settings.text: At Tiare Rose, we combine luxury shopping with premier services for an all-inclusive experience that is absolutely complimentary. From curating a wardrobe using your favorite brands and offering up-to-date trend advice, to coordinating gifts and securing the most sought-after pieces, our dedicated Style Concierges work directly with you to personalize your experience and provide the utmost convenience.

settings.subheading: So gorgeous, we're green with envy
settings.title: LUST LIST
WHO WE ArE
settings.text:
Tiare:  /tiːˈɑːreɪ/ (in Tahiti) a gardenia of a variety bearing fragrant white flowers, symbolizing harmony.

Our goal is to create harmony in the fashion industry by creating a platform where brands, sales professionals and their clients all win.

settings.subtitle: ULTIMATE
settings.title: PERSONALIZATION
settings.text: Tiare Rose connects top luxury retail sales professionals and their client base with contemporary and designer brands they love for an exclusive, bespoke shopping experience. Style Concierges provide personal recommendations and in-person services that are impossible in e-commerce.

settings.subtitle: INCOMPARABLE
settings.title: CONVENIENCE
settings.text:
Your Style Concierge is a professional. They are constantly continuing their education in each of the brands we carry to provide you the right style with the perfect fit. They take the time and drama out of online shopping and keep you from having to step inside a department store.

Your style is beyond just fashion. That’s why we offer concierge add-on services including closet purging and organization, consignment assistance, and repairs/ alterations, all at reasonable rates.

settings.subtitle: SHARED
settings.title: VALUES
settings.text: We value human capital and believe our Style Concierges should be compensated fairly for their expertise. Increased sustainability is the fashion industry is imperative.
